website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch putting mat that looks and performs great in any living space.
pros: Includes multiple alignment guides to help you improve your putting motion
Portable mat is lightweight and easy to place in any room or take with you on the go
Features an upslope at the cup that simulates an actual green
Continuous ball return capability ensures you can perfect your putting skills without interruption
cons: Won't lay flat and tends to curl on the sides
Pricey in comparison to similar mats

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it......
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I wanted to love this putting mat, but unfortunately that’s not the case. I ordered it a little over a month ago and have not been able to use once due to all the bumps in the mat, I have had various boxes and books on it day and night and still have multiple areas that’s haven’t gone down flat. Unfortunately this is a dud.....
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging is creating permanent creases in the thicker putting surface.
customer_reviews.text: Decent but overpriced. The putting surface is a thicker, higher quality composite that lays down more easily without the rippling seen in the older model. But two separate purchases showed permanent creases in the putting surface that made this item unusable. It seems the new and improved thicker mat is more prone to crushing when jammed in the box with the plastic return track during packaging. A simple fix but somebody should inform the factory. I returned the worst one and used a hair dryer to fluff up the synthetic nap as much as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Enkidu

customer_reviews.title: Won't lay flat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is an avid golfer for a Christmas present. He was so excited to use it, but as soon as he rolled it out, the mat was so creased from packaging there was no way he could use it. We let it sit for a few days to allow the creases to relax, still nothing. We tried putting heavy books along the creases, and even ironing it on a low heat, nothing. It's useless for any type of putting. So sad this was a failure!
customer_reviews.author: L. P. Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Simple, but Incredibly Useful
customer_reviews.text: I have been skeptical of these things, but I figured that instead of sitting on my butt during the Masters, why not get up and putt during the commercials? This thing is outstanding. I finally figured out that I was pushing all of my putts, and this proved it. The lines on the mat are ironically simple, but incredibly useful. If you are having problems with putting, you got to invest the money in this. I can't wait to try out my new putting stroke on the real greens at the club now. I didn't have the problems with creases like others did, but I could see that being a major issue.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: OK but mat needs help.
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with people that state the mat won't lay flat. I put books on it nightly to flatten it out. It always pulls up in wrinkles after pressing it out at night. It do like the concept and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Unresponsive product support team
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of friends to have this and it is a good way to practice putting. However, buyer beware, the putting Matt came to me missing a few pieces. I would guess that the total value of those pieces is easily less than one dollar but they are would hold the return ramp together so that the ball comes back to you. After referring to the product support tab I was just directed to call the manufacturer and ask for help I have twice left messages asking them to call me back and send these small tabs. I have never gotten anything by way of a response. And I think that is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: SunLover

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to set up and put away
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and he loves it. It's easy to set up and put away, so it does not have to stay out. The lines are helpful to tell you how far to go back and then forward when putting a certain distance, and it is fun to use. Of course, all greens on golf courses have their own unique issues, but this is still fun and easy and gives you practice.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: This will shave ~4 off your handicap at a minimum.
customer_reviews.text: Long gone are the days of 3-jacking a putt. Its COVID season, put this bad boy in your room or home office, send 10 putts down range each day while on worthless conference calls with your boss that you are in no way a value add. Another 10 during all breaks throughout the day and you will stop being the butt of jokes on the course. 2 PUTTS ONLY. Get back that confidence you've been missing, impress the cart girl, and maybe win that push on the back 9 once in a blue moon.
customer_reviews.author: Jgurt

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool, but the mat tends to be wavy.
customer_reviews.text: Remembered having a putting mat similar to this as a kid to learn how to put with consistency. My wife has started golfing so I wanted another one. The mat itself is exactly as I remember and works to learn how to put with acceleration. The material of the mat however is thin meaning the wrinkles that are formed when its packaged almost caused it to be folded too much. It took well over a week for it to lie truly flat.
customer_reviews.author: Jon DeLeon, Author | CreativeGenius | Beyond Normal Books LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great quarantine fun
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this working but it works exactly like it's supposed to. The "green" laid out perfectly, no ridges, it's got a rubber backing of some kind on the underside and it makes it heavy enough to perfectly lay flat on my wood floor. VERY pleased about that. (I also took it out of the box as soon as it arrived and it didn't sit out on the driveway in So Cal heat.) The ball return works just like it's supposed to. Don't remember what i paid for this but I know I look for mid-range pricing and this was a great purchase for whatever I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jena P.

customer_reviews.title: Blessing and a curse
customer_reviews.text: This item has been both a blessing and a curse. My husband will not leave the basement anymore. Every time I call for him he is putting. However, when I go downstairs to challenge him... I win. Explain that to me? Practice makes perfect? I think not..
customer_reviews.author: Frank Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband
customer_reviews.text: Husband absolutely loves this green. He just got it for Father’s Day weekend and is still playing!! Lays flat, good ball return. No issues👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: ally

customer_reviews.title: Great practice
customer_reviews.text: Installs in a few mins and works very well. The mat needs a day or two to become completely flat towards the end but otherwise true roll and the return works well. Be sure to move off the middle lines every so often so you don’t get too used to them, it helps with perfecting your line but on the course it feels strange if you haven’t practiced slightly off them from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: but everyone loved playing with this
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a present for my father in law, but everyone loved playing with this! I'm sure it's good practice for a golfer (I wouldn't know, I don't golf), but everyone else had fun playing with it as a skee ball type game!
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra HammondTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and has helped my putting along with the Putting Stick product.
customer_reviews.text: I like this putting green. I use it in conjunction with the 1 inch putting stick to insure I'm hitting my putts very squarely. They say every putt is a straight putt, you just have to find the apex of a breaking putt and putt it straight to that point with the right speed and it goes in! We all know it's that simple, but it's not simple to get the two things right. But if you know you're hitting your putts where you're lined up, it helps boost your confidence and you'll take one variable out of he equation and make more putts. Good luck and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: HalZ

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, even on my slightly slanted, carpeted floor
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is less bumpy and faster than my carpet, which is significant for me. It took a day to get the few slight "bumps" out of the surface after unrolling it. I like the markings at the 3-, 5-, and 7-foot ranges as they allow me to see how well a ball is rolling after I strike it and just where it is going before it gets to the hole. Getting the ball return assembled was straightforward (the ball return "rail" comes in three pieces), although the ball return rail is more decorative than useful, as the balls tend to stop near the base of the hole rather than rolling any significant distance down the rail.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Great practice
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna start by saying this is a great practice putting mat. It's functional right out of the box. The ball return works great. My only complaint would be that it gets to be pretty easy after awhile. I guess that's a good thing. I read a review that said they had made the hole smaller which I think would help as I can sink damn near every putt now from the end of the mat. But I love this thing. Good quality. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Robbins

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Really helps, allows you to see the putter alignment and and let's you see if your stroke does not stay on line. Feel is pretty good with regard to how an actual green feels and the ball return works perfectly, every time. Even if you miss the cup. With the incline that is part of the mat it lets you see when you are not stroking the ball properly or hard enough to get it to the cup. For the money, it is a good buy and if you spend some time on the putting green, it should help with your feel and direction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't miss a putt
customer_reviews.text: There is some voodoo magic with this as it is almost impossible to miss a putt. At first I thought the alignment lines on this product were the answer to my inconsistent putting -- I made 9 of my first 10 putts (the one that missed was short). Then my son, who has never played golf, gave it a shot and made 5 of 5. We hit some ping pong balls and sank 4 of 5. All of these shots were from 9 feet -- all the way back! I think the swing lines are a great tool -- but I can save $50 and just put masking tape on the ground to practice my swing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product on time and it is exactly as I expected. It is really simple to set up (less than minute). I put it on my hardwood floors and it lays flat and rolls well. The ball return is a nice feature but there is no ball roll stopper at the end, so the balls will roll off the track. I solved this problem quickly by taping a small piece of the box onto the end of the track. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J

customer_reviews.title: Good Value & Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband when COVID-19 caused us to be working from home. He set it up by his desk and uses it while he's on phone calls. He really enjoys it! I shopped around and it's identical to more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsxa

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully this translates to more putts made inside 10 ft?!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little practice green. I did see others note that there were some areas that had creased while in the box. I too ran into that, but was able to get them to flatten out by putting boxes on top of the areas for a few days, not it sits flat. What I really like the most are the guidelines that run up towards the cup, you can really get a sense for how well your stroke is working. I also like the return mechanism, you only need 2 balls to have a continuous putting session.
customer_reviews.author: Hammey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect roll.  Best mat on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my golf team. This mat rolls awesome. A lot of the mats have trouble where the flat meets the incline but the boll just keeps rolling smoothly on this one. The white lines at 3 feet, 5 feet, and 7 feet are great for training your eyes to see the correct line to the hole, developing a straight back and straight through stroke, and teaching the proper acceleration through the ball. It's so easy for the kids to feel the proper acceleration with the white markers showing the correct backswing and follow through lengths.
customer_reviews.author: Chase T.

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A DEAL!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and most said that the putting surface would lump up from shipping and hard to use. Some complained about slow ball retrieve! WTH....mine was perfect, i use two balls to keep on putting fast. Retrieve is fine. In the end it is seven feet plus long and you have to sink it after giving it enough stroke to make it up the incline. How many of us leave it short, how many of us can sink 7' ers consistantly? Very few. The $39 price may be the best bargin in gold training! A big yes from Me and my son!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good training tool that helps accelerate the stroke.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bargain priced mat. The guides at 3, 5 & 7 feet are very helpful as those are important distances to practice. Ball return helps but sometimes it just dribbles the ball back about half way. That may be because I have in on a heavy rug. Regardless a good putting training tool at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Heller

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but quality is questionable.
customer_reviews.text: We like this putting green but the quality is average. The green has a nice felt but the foundation with the hole is flimsy and would easily crack if accidentally stepped on it. The return rail is also cheap and balls don't roll smoothly on them. It's fine to play every once in a while but I don't expect it to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: GoHawks

customer_reviews.title: A very nice practice putting green
customer_reviews.text: A very nice practice putting green. I use it in my patio on the concrete, and it rolls very nicely. Must be on a level surface in order for the graphic guidelines on the mat to be useful. The gravity ball return works great, so much better than those electric ball returns that break down constantly. Mine arrived rolled up, not folded, so no issues at all with creases and the like. Putting is definitely improving! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Fun but easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice putting mat for the price. Ball return works and makes it easy to hit multiple strokes from the same spot. The incline helps promote good speed. I wish the hole was smaller though. It's pretty easy to sink putts which is a bit misleading on a course. I'm going to try putting shims under areas to create some slope and see how it affects the putting line.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Works as describes. Fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: This "putting green" mat is well made and flattened out nicely when placed over my living room carpet. I like the "stroke guide" stripes on the mat and I think this thing will actually help me groove my putting stroke. It is tons of fun to use, and the only one in the family who enjoys it more than I do is the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Dilly Dally Dan

customer_reviews.title: ... other reviewers in saying it is a little too easy. I made 19 putts in a row from ...
customer_reviews.text: I will agree with other reviewers in saying it is a little too easy. I made 19 putts in a row from 7 feet the first day I had it. The speed is pretty quick, but it is still fun to play on. Will also agree that it is very high price for some plastic and a piece of carpet which is why I've held off on buying any kind of product like this. That being said, I like the guidelines on it and the auto ball return. Will probably be using this all winter :)
customer_reviews.author: Skylar G

customer_reviews.title: Great for practicing putting swing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great living room putting green to practice your swing! We have competitions with grandparents vs grandkids and everyone enjoys it! We layed it on carpet and it lays straight and the ball return works great! The hole though is a bit large so to make it harder to get the ball in, I will need to make it smaller and closer to the actual size out in the field. Saw another reviewer with the same thought and used a cardboard to make the hole diameter smaller...I think I may try that as well!
customer_reviews.author: H.K.

customer_reviews.title: No customer service!
customer_reviews.text: After 5 weeks still waiting for customer service to ship “ connector” pieces to make this work. Lots of promises but NO action ;(
customer_reviews.author: closetmaid

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: The side part that brings the ball. Ask comes apart all the time and is a pain to put together. The green it’s self is quality and very fun to use .
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi Scott

customer_reviews.title: Ball return doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: My college-age son just started playing golf, so I thought this would be nice for him to use in his dorm. Its easy to set up and folds up nicely for storage. It’s fun for practice and friendly competition with his friends. Con: the ball return doesn’t work. The chute from the hole to the return piece is too narrow for the ball to roll through on its own. You need to push it through. If you’re going to offer a feature in a product, make sure it works. There’s no design reason for it to be so narrow. Just a tad larger would be great. He’s new to golf, perhaps they make smaller balls?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Drastic improvement in my putting!
customer_reviews.text: After two months of use I would have to say it was a very good purchase for me. The winter weather here in MN doesn’t allow me time on a golf course, so I bought one of these to work on my putting. I just returned from AZ, where we golfed daily during the vacation and my putting is nearly perfect under 7 feet. I credit my practice, 150 putts a day using SKLZ Accelerator Pro. It helped my correct some mistakes which are now obvious to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: putting green is fine - no wrinkles or anything that other reviewers have ...
customer_reviews.text: putting green is fine - no wrinkles or anything that other reviewers have complained about. My only issue is that the putts become too easy to make after awhile. I am not a great putter - but I can make 10-15 in a row as the cup almost funnels the ball in. Fine for an inexpensive putting swing trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Wyse1D

customer_reviews.title: It has helped my game
customer_reviews.text: Putting has been what's holding me back and being able to use this nearly every day for 20-30 minutes has helped tremendously. It will help you figure out your stance and focal point for hitting straight putts.
customer_reviews.author: C. Crawmer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged but usable.
customer_reviews.text: Giving four stars because product had severe cosmetic damage upon delivery. It doesn't affect the performance but disappointed in condition. Great practice tool for those winter/rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: M. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice putting mat
customer_reviews.text: This putting mat is great for improving your putting skills. The three different putting distances really help in judging the speed of your stroke. My putting has greatly improved since I have used this putting aid. I recommend it to anyone who wants to improve.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why everyone likes this
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is an okay putting green. However, why is it not able to turn into a flat putt. It is difficult to get to lay flat and you must lay it out for a few days to a week to be able to call it flat. Also, the "stroke guide" is okay, but I'd like to have more than three options on putting distance. Will be getting a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle P

customer_reviews.title: A bit too easy. An optional insert to make the hole smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit too easy. An optional insert to make the hole smaller would be a great addition (DIY hack.)
customer_reviews.author: 604NB

customer_reviews.title: This putting green is not level
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this putting green. The speed and lines are helpful. The problem is the the plastic structure under the hole end is very cheaply made. It is not even and shots that miss left go in anyway. I would buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: realperson

customer_reviews.title: Making More 3-4 Footers
customer_reviews.text: A good tool to work on par saving putts. The incline helps develop a stroke with good pace to hold your line all the way to the cup. The ball return is a nice feature. I have developed a more consistent putting stroke using this tool. I am putting much more confidently on 3-4 footers.
customer_reviews.author: Colin M.

customer_reviews.title: Rolls out flat-Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is great! I gave it to my twins for their 17th birthday and they love it! I was worried about some reviews saying it had wrinkles they couldn’t get out, but it arrived in a roll, not folded. It is perfectly flat and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Mdjt5

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coming apart
customer_reviews.text: The plastic connection where the ball returns keep coming apart and I have to keep putting it together when we play. Not worth the money. Unfortunately when I discovered that, It was too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This product is built pretty well and had easy assembly. The turf is a little thinner than I expected and not much width but that's pretty standard for these putting games.
customer_reviews.author: Mora

customer_reviews.title: Good value for what I paid.
customer_reviews.text: I like it as something to have to practice, but after putting and making 35 in a row, it seems to me it doesn’t represant real life putting because it is way easier to make a putt. Maybe it’s beacuse of the uphill putt. And for some reason it has a tendency to slope to the left.
customer_reviews.author: Oskar

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: The idea of it is great. But the ball ALWAYS goes in. So I'm not sure how much "practice" one is getting.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My father and son used to play "trail golf" on our property in the Texas Hill Country, but since moving to the suburbs their golf skills have gotten rusty. This is a great way for them to practice in the comfort of our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: It is great for practicing putting obviously, definitely does the job in the respect, the only thing I didn’t like which is kinda minor was that I can’t really get it flat on the ground without having a small fold here and there. If you can figure out how to get it flat then it’s damn near perfect. It’s a also of good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: ahals23

customer_reviews.title: Lasting Fun and Skill Training
customer_reviews.text: Serious fun and helpful with your putt-ing game. Challenge yourself to make 10 in a row and challenge your friends when they walk in the door. Great for rainy days and when it's sunny. Feeling confident? Putt uphill in a driveway. Easier said than done.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but costly at it's price what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Decent, but costly at it's price what it is. No balls or club (as expected), just a mat and plastic cup/return. Missing connectors for ball return tracks. Took a while with books on it to flatten it.
customer_reviews.author: TheRic

customer_reviews.title: It's a great tool to practice putting
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I was concerned about kinks in the green pad...NO PROBLEM! This rolled out perfectly. It's a great tool to practice putting...hopefully, it shows on the course. I WOULD BUY AGAIN :)
customer_reviews.author: Kate Stempkowski

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it! No problems with wrinkles as some reviewers had. Laid flat right out of the box and my husband used it right away! He especially appreciates the ball return feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jelynn S

customer_reviews.title: Dads favorite
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad and he loves it. Love that it has the guidelines for practicing. The return works perfect. Has improved his putting game tremendously to me dismay.
customer_reviews.author: carrcrash

customer_reviews.title: Great for putting practice!
customer_reviews.text: Good design. Folds up easily for storage. The green is high quality. The marks on the green enable various practice routines. We have putting competitions indoors in the a/c when the weather is hot and miserable during Florida summers. Bought a second one as a gift and recipient loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Florida mom

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money
customer_reviews.text: This item is the biggest disappointment of any item I've ever ordered from Amazon. A cheap piece of felt that doesn't lie flat, which curls up on the sides, causing the ball to always go in on hit the return. Sorry I threw the box away so quickly. It would be the fastest return I've made
customer_reviews.author: craig wilder

customer_reviews.title: Its a pretty good mat
customer_reviews.text: The mat came rolled and does lie on the floor well. The ball return is gravity, so its a bit slow, but I do like the return. Interestingly, it is easy to putt very well on this, in fact a bit too easy, but it is a confidence builder. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, returns ball right to you. To store it, roll the carpet carefully, don’t fold it, so it will be flat when used again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna K

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but not a good gift. My husband was not hyped about this even though I expected him to be. Think twice before this buy as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Whittley

customer_reviews.title: ... shown on line and when layed out material was good and lay was flat without any effort or weight ...
customer_reviews.text: Product as shown on line and when layed out material was good and lay was flat without any effort or weight for smoothing it out. Have used numerous times and am very pleased with it. Good putting practice surface for indoors during bad weather. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Ross Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Golfing like a pro
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend who is a salesmen and is practicing golf. He took it to his office and he loves it. This thing is fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying the practice. It is a simple concept that seems to help. Cold here so no golf yet. If they wanted to make better my advice is to make it wider so we can putt from various angles. I put some books on it so I get feed back if backswing gets to long. Also, helps keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Yausa

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic gift for my son in law who works from home and loves putting while on calls HA. Only issue with this gift is the ball return feature. It does not have any inserts to connect to each other so they come apart very easily and you might have to glue them but that defeats the purpose of it being transportable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this product I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent To practice your short game at homeThe mat rolls up so it doesn’t take up much space when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for an event for our office Olympics. It was awesome. I would totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price, but you are getting what you pay for with this. The putting surface rolls well, but the materials for the hole, and return ramp are cheap plastic so it is very easy to damage if you accidentally step on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ponyupgolf

customer_reviews.title: Really like this mat - love the raised area where the ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mat - love the raised area where the cup is - helps you to get your speed down - will say that it is MUCH faster than grass - I had no issues with it laying flat - I use mine on carpet and it laid flat right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh, I would spend money on something better
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little putter gift, but the rug doesn't lay perfectly flat and the ball return is a lot less stable than I expected. Overall, the quality is what you pay, and you don't pay a lot for this, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Father's Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son on Father's Day. He keeps it in his garage and uses it daily. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This came exactly as expected and my fiancé and I use it several times a week if not daily. Works great to develop muscle memory for varying putting distances and the ball return (black tube on the side) makes it convenient to do multiple putts with only a couple balls. It's also very convenient to have right at home and not have to always go to the practice green on the course if you do not plan to play that day.
customer_reviews.author: A. Glidden

customer_reviews.title: Would be better if it had multiple holes and a less rectangular ...
customer_reviews.text: Ball return feature is slow. Would be better if it had multiple holes and a less rectangular shape.
customer_reviews.author: Domo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for the price. The markings really help to improve your putting stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I tested it out and it’s great for gaining confidence with those 3 and 6 footers

product_meta.title: SKLZ Accelerator Pro Indoor Putting Green with Ball Return, 9 feet x 16.25 inches
product_meta.description:
The Accelerator Pro Indoor Putting Green features a patent pending ball return for easy putt repetition to improve your game, get more consistency in less time. The continuous ball return allows you to train without interruption. And because you can keep putting without re setting, you can focus on maintaining a steady stroke and consistent tempo on each putt, making your training more efficient and effective.

At 9 feet long by 16.25 inches wide, your Accelerator Pro indoor putting green will fit well in most rooms or covered patios. The premium turf lets you practice key putt lengths on a true roll surface with a stimp reading similar to actual greens. Precise alignment guides at 3, 5, and 7 feet assist every aspect of your putting motion – squaring the face, back swing, and follow through – for greater accuracy and distance control on every putt. The Accelerator Pro features a gentle upslope at the cup so you practice accelerating through the ball. Miss your putt and the ball will roll back to you on the putting green.

The SKLZ Manufacturer Warranty for the Accelerator Pro indoor putting green is 1 year.
feature_bullets: 9 foot indoor putting green with continuous automatic ball return for developing accuracy and control
Squaring and alignment guides at 3, 5, and 7 feet help promote consistency in every aspect of putting motion
Continuous automatic ball return allows for uninterrupted training
True-roll surface and upslope at the cup emulate putts found on actual greens Measures 9 feet x 16.25 inches; great for use at home or office
